subject: Difference in price
description_text:
Hi im just enquiring about the price difference on your website
incomparison to the same company on aliexpress.
Why are your products significantly more expensive on aliexpress? Just
wondering.
Kind regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Sean Chad,  Could you please provide the links and price screenshots of the two products? We can check them for you. If the store on AliExpress is the official SIMSONN shop, the price difference could be due to factors such as platform commission, sales channel or timing, tax inclusion, or whether the items are shipped from an overseas local warehouse.

Ok on your website is all the prices in USD and needed to be converted to
local currency at time of payment?

On Sun, 27 July 2025, 14:21 service@simsonn.com,
Hi Sean Chad,  Normally, no manual action is required as the payment tools will automatically handle the conversion.
